channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: An Introduction to CSS-in-JS
item.description: Explore CSS-in-JS techniques and how they can streamline your styling process within JavaScript frameworks like React.

item.title: Building Chat Applications with WebSockets
item.description: Understand how WebSockets work and how to use them to create real-time chat applications.

item.title: GraphQL vs. REST: Making the Right Choice for Your API
item.description: Compare GraphQL and REST, analyzing their strengths and weaknesses to determine which is best for your API needs.

item.title: How to Use Docker for Local Development
item.description: A beginner’s guide to setting up Docker for local development environments, enabling consistent workflows across teams.

item.title: The Basics of Unit Testing with Jest
item.description: Get started with unit testing in JavaScript using Jest, a popular testing framework for React applications.

item.title: The Role of Caching in Web Development
item.description: Explore caching strategies to improve website performance, including browser caching, CDN caching, and server-side caching.
